remarks: Implications for the value of an operation, defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstraction as a result, having an element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement:
elovmpt2rab.o $e |- O = ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> { z e. M | ph } ) $.
elovmpt2rab.v $e |- ( ( X e. _V /\ Y e. _V ) -> M e. _V ) $.
elovmpt2rab $p |- ( Z e. ( X O Y ) -> ( X e. _V /\ Y e. _V /\ Z e. M ) ) $.
$d M x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d Y x y z $.
$d Z z $.
